sections.heading: 1. INTRODUCTION
sections.text:
This Cookie Policy explains how [COMPANY_NAME] ('we', 'us', 'our') uses cookies and similar technologies on our website [WEBSITE_URL].

By using our website, you consent to our use of cookies in accordance with this policy. You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish - see section 6 below.

sections.heading: 2. WHAT ARE COOKIES?
sections.text:
Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, smartphone, or other electronic device) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

Cookies can be:
- **Session cookies**: Temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser
- **Persistent cookies**: Cookies that remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them

- **First-party cookies**: Set by the website you are visiting
- **Third-party cookies**: Set by a domain other than the website you are visiting (e.g., analytics or advertising services)

sections.heading: 3. WHW WE USE COOKIES
sections.text:
We use cookies for the following purposes:

**3.1 Strictly Necessary Cookies (No consent required)**

These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

| Cookie Name | Purpose | Duration |
|-------------|---------|----------|
| [COOKIE_1 - e.g., session_id] | [Maintains user session] | [Session] |
| [COOKIE_2 - e.g., security_token] | [Security and authentication] | [24 hours] |
| [COOKIE_3 - e.g., cookie_consent] | [Stores cookie preferences] | [1 year] |

Legal basis: Strictly necessary for service provision (PECR Reg 6(4), no consent required)

**3.2 Performance/Analytics Cookies (Consent required)**

These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often. This helps us improve the website.

| Cookie Name | Provider | Purpose | Duration |
|-------------|----------|---------|----------|
| [COOKIE_4 - e.g., _ga] | [Google Analytics] | [Tracks website usage] | [2 years] |
| [COOKIE_5 - e.g., _gid] | [Google Analytics] | [Distinguishes users] | [24 hours] |
| [COOKIE_6] | [Provider] | [Purpose] | [Duration] |

Legal basis: Consent (PECR Reg 6)

**3.3 Functionality Cookies (Consent required)**

These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as language or region) and provide enhanced features.

| Cookie Name | Purpose | Duration |
|-------------|---------|----------|
| [COOKIE_7 - e.g., lang_pref] | [Remembers language preference] | [1 year] |
| [COOKIE_8 - e.g., region] | [Remembers region selection] | [6 months] |

Legal basis: Consent (PECR Reg 6)

**3.4 Targeting/Advertising Cookies (Consent required)**

These cookies are used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

| Cookie Name | Provider | Purpose | Duration |
|-------------|----------|---------|----------|
| [COOKIE_9 - e.g., _fbp] | [Facebook] | [Advertising and retargeting] | [3 months] |
| [COOKIE_10 - e.g., IDE] | [Google] | [Advertising targeting] | [1 year] |
| [COOKIE_11] | [Provider] | [Purpose] | [Duration] |

Legal basis: Consent (PECR Reg 6)

sections.heading: 4. THIRD-PARTY COOKIES
sections.text:
Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages:

- **Google Analytics**: We use Google Analytics to analyze website usage. Google's privacy policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy
- [THIRD_PARTY_1]: [Description and privacy policy link]
- [THIRD_PARTY_2]: [Description and privacy policy link]

We do not control these third-party cookies. Please check the third-party websites for more information.

sections.heading: 5. CONSENT
sections.text:
When you first visit our website, we will ask for your consent to use non-essential cookies via a cookie banner.

You can:
- Accept all cookies
- Reject non-essential cookies (only strictly necessary cookies will be used)
- Customize your cookie preferences

You can change your preferences at any time by clicking [COOKIE_SETTINGS_LINK] or [cookie settings icon in footer].

sections.heading: 6. HOW TO CONTROL COOKIES
sections.text:
**6.1 Cookie Settings on Our Website**

You can manage your cookie preferences at any time by visiting [COOKIE_SETTINGS_URL] or clicking the cookie settings icon [ICON_LOCATION].

**6.2 Browser Settings**

Most browsers allow you to refuse or delete cookies. The methods for doing so vary from browser to browser. Please consult your browser's help menu for instructions:

- **Chrome**: https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647
- **Firefox**: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/clear-cookies-and-site-data-firefox
- **Safari**: https://support.apple.com/en-gb/guide/safari/sfri11471/mac
- **Edge**: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/delete-cookies-in-microsoft-edge-63947406-40ac-c3b8-57b9-2a946a29ae09
- **Internet Explorer**: https://support.microsoft.com/en-gb/help/17442/windows-internet-explorer-delete-manage-cookies

Please note that if you block or delete cookies, some features of our website may not work properly.

**6.3 Opt-Out Tools**

- **Google Analytics opt-out**: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout
- **Network Advertising Initiative opt-out**: http://optout.networkadvertising.org/
- **Your Online Choices (EDAA)**: http://www.youronlinechoices.com/

sections.heading: 7. OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES
sections.text:
In addition to cookies, we may use:

- **Web beacons/pixels**: Small graphic images used to track page views and user behavior
- **Local storage**: HTML5 local storage for storing user preferences
- **Fingerprinting**: [IF USED: We [do/do not] use device fingerprinting]

These technologies are subject to the same consent requirements as cookies.

sections.heading: 8. CHANGES TO THIS POLICY
sections.text:
We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. The latest version will always be available at [POLICY_URL].

Last updated: [DATE]

sections.heading: 9. CONTACT US
sections.text:
If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact:

- Email: [CONTACT_EMAIL]
- Address: [CONTACT_ADDRESS]
- Data Protection Officer: [DPO_EMAIL] (if applicable)

compliance_checklist: Clear distinction between essential and non-essential cookies
Strictly necessary cookies clearly identified (no consent needed)
Consent obtained for non-essential cookies before placement (PECR Reg 6)
Cookie banner implemented with accept/reject/customize options
Granular consent options available (not just 'accept all')
Easy withdrawal of consent (cookie settings accessible)
Cookie table includes: name, purpose, duration, provider
Third-party cookies disclosed with privacy policy links
No pre-ticked boxes (consent must be freely given)
No cookie walls (access not conditional on consent for non-essential)
